_description: Database queries and auth operations via Supabase
_workway: Postgres access without pgAdmin or Supabase Dashboard
_setup: 1. Get project URL and service role key from Supabase Dashboard
2. Settings > API > Service Role Key (keep secret!)
_usage: Query data: 'How many users signed up this week?'
Check schema: 'What columns are in the users table?'
Run migration: 'Add an email_verified column to users'
_d1_alternative: For Cloudflare projects, prefer D1 over Supabase. Use Supabase MCP when working with existing Supabase projects.
_security: Service role key bypasses RLS - use carefully
Consider using anon key for read-only operations
